data.name: ResetLinkSent
data.value: If the email exists, a reset link has been sent.

data.name: PasswordPolicyViolation
data.value: Password does not meet security policies: {0}

data.name: EmailInvalid
data.value: The email is invalid and not secure

data.name: UsernameInvalid
data.value: Username must be between 3-30 characters and not be a reserved word

data.name: NameInvalid
data.value: Name must contain only letters, spaces, accents, apostrophes and hyphens

data.name: TokenInvalid
data.value: Token must be valid in base64 or hexadecimal format

data.name: PasswordRecommendation.VeryWeak.LongerPassword
data.value: Consider using a longer password (12+ characters)

data.name: PasswordRecommendation.VeryWeak.MixedCharacters
data.value: Mix uppercase, lowercase, numbers and symbols

data.name: PasswordRecommendation.VeryWeak.AvoidCommon
data.value: Avoid common words or personal information

data.name: PasswordRecommendation.Weak.Strengthen
data.value: Your password is good, but you could make it stronger

data.name: PasswordRecommendation.Strong.Excellent
data.value: Excellent! Your password is very secure

data.name: PasswordLengthRequired
data.value: Password must be between 8 and 128 characters

data.name: TimeoutExceeded
data.value: Timeout exceeded - Please try again later

data.name: OperationCanceled
data.value: Operation canceled - Please try again later

data.name: SupportReference
data.value: For support, contact with this reference ID

data.name: IdMismatch
data.value: URL ID does not match DTO ID

data.name: EmailWelcome.AccountCreatedTitle
data.value: Your account has been created successfully!

data.name: EmailWelcome.FullServiceAccess
data.value: You can now start using all our services and features.

data.name: EmailWelcome.BeginningStepsTitle
data.value: Some steps you can follow to get started:

data.name: EmailWelcome.CompleteProfile
data.value: Complete your profile with additional information

data.name: EmailWelcome.NeedHelp
data.value: If you have any questions or need help, do not hesitate to contact us.

data.name: EmailPasswordReset.RequestReceived
data.value: We have received a request to reset the password for your account.

data.name: EmailPasswordReset.ExpirationWarning
data.value: This token will expire in {0} hours for security reasons

data.name: EmailPasswordReset.SingleUseOnly
data.value: It can only be used once

data.name: EmailPasswordReset.IgnoreIfNotRequested
data.value: If you did not request this change, you can ignore this email

data.name: EmailPasswordReset.HowToReset
data.value: To reset your password, use the token shown above in the application.

data.name: EmailPasswordReset.SecurityConcern
data.value: If you did not request this change or have any questions about the security of your account, please contact our support team immediately.

data.name: EmailConfirmation.ConfirmEmailRequest
data.value: To complete your registration, we need to confirm your email address.

data.name: EmailConfirmation.UseTokenInstructions
data.value: Please use this token in the application to verify your account.

data.name: EmailConfirmation.TokenExpiration
data.value: This token will expire in {0} hours.

data.name: EmailConfirmation.RequestNewToken
data.value: If the token expires, you will need to request a new one from the application.

data.name: EmailConfirmation.FullAccess
data.value: Once you confirm your email, you will have full access to all platform features.

data.name: EmailConfirmation.IgnoreIfNotYou
data.value: If you did not create an account with us, you can ignore this email.

data.name: EmailPasswordChanged.ConfirmationMessage
data.value: We inform you that your password has been changed successfully on {0} at {1}.

data.name: EmailPasswordChanged.AccountProtected
data.value: Your account is now protected with your new password.

data.name: EmailPasswordChanged.UnauthorizedAccess
data.value: If you did not make this change, your account could be compromised. Please:

data.name: EmailPasswordChanged.AdditionalSecurityMeasures
data.value: As an additional security measure, we recommend:

data.name: EmailPasswordChanged.DontShareCredentials
data.value: Do not share your credentials with third parties

data.name: EmailProfileUpdated.ConfirmationMessage
data.value: We confirm that your profile information has been updated successfully on {0} at {1}.

data.name: EmailProfileUpdated.ChangesActive
data.value: The changes to your profile are now active in your account.

data.name: EmailProfileUpdated.UnauthorizedUpdate
data.value: If you did not make this update, we recommend:

data.name: EmailAccountLocked.AccountLocked
data.value: Your account has been temporarily locked

data.name: EmailAccountLocked.LockReason
data.value: due to multiple failed login attempts.

data.name: EmailAccountLocked.ProtectionReason
data.value: This action was taken to protect your account from unauthorized access.

data.name: EmailAccountLocked.ContactSupportForUnlock
data.value: Contact support if you need immediate unlock

data.name: EmailAccountLocked.VerifyCredentials
data.value: Verify that you are using the correct credentials

data.name: EmailAccountLocked.UnauthorizedAttempt
data.value: If you did not try to access your account, this could indicate an unauthorized access attempt. We recommend:

data.name: EmailAccountDeleted.DeletionConfirmation
data.value: We confirm that your account has been successfully deleted on {0} at {1}.

data.name: EmailAccountDeleted.DataRemoved
data.value: All your personal information has been removed from our systems in accordance with our privacy policies.

data.name: EmailAccountDeleted.UnauthorizedDeletion
data.value: If you did not request the deletion of your account, this is very serious. Please:

data.name: EmailAccountDeleted.NoAccess
data.value: You can no longer access your account

data.name: EmailAccountDeleted.PermanentDeletion
data.value: Your data has been permanently deleted

data.name: EmailAccountDeleted.RecreateAccount
data.value: If you wish to return, you will need to create a new account

data.name: EmailAccountDeleted.Farewell
data.value: We are sorry to see you go. If you decide to return in the future, we will be here to welcome you again.

data.name: EmailLayout.AutomaticMessage
data.value: This email was sent automatically, please do not reply to this message.

data.value: If you have any questions, contact our support: {0}

data.name: EmailWelcome.WelcomeMessage
data.value: We warmly welcome you to our platform.

data.value: Provide all the details you can remember

data.name: EmailAccountDeleted.VerifyOtherServices
data.value: Verify the security of your other online services

data.name: EmailAccountDeleted.QuestionAboutDeletion
data.value: If you have any questions about the deletion process, do not hesitate to contact us.

data.value: Change your password once the account is unlocked

data.name: EmailAccountLocked.ReviewActivity
data.value: Review recent activity on your account

data.name: EmailAccountLocked.ApologyMessage

data.value: Change your password as soon as possible

data.value: Review recent activity on your account

data.value: Remember that you can update your profile information at any time from your account settings.

data.value: If you have any questions about the changes made, do not hesitate to contact us.
